sentences.en: I miss the quietness of the countryside.
sentences.cn: 我非常怀念乡间的宁静。

sentences.en: I will not have you running around the countryside without my authority.
sentences.cn: 不经过我同意，我不会让你在乡下东奔西跑的。

sentences.en: I've always loved the English countryside.
sentences.cn: 一直以来我都很喜欢英国的乡间。

sentences.en: Motorways actually cover less than 0.1 percent of the countryside.
sentences.cn: 高速公路的实际覆盖面积还不到农村地区的0.1%。

sentences.en: People were leaving the countryside in droves to look for work in the cities.
sentences.cn: 一批一批的人离开农村到城里找工作。

sentences.en: Since the Sixties, afforestation has changed the Welsh countryside.
sentences.cn: 60年代以来，植树造林已经改变了威尔士的乡村面貌。

sentences.en: The house had lovely views over open countryside .
sentences.cn: 这房子望出去是开阔的乡村美景。

sentences.en: The Moselle winds through some 160 miles of tranquil countryside.
sentences.cn: 摩泽尔河在宁静的乡间蜿蜒穿行约160英里。

sentences.en: The surrounding countryside is windswept and rocky.
sentences.cn: 这周围的乡村风多石头多。

sentences.en: The video is filmed in stunningly beautiful countryside.
sentences.cn: 这段录像拍摄于景色无比优美的乡村。

sentences.en: The view from our window was one of beautiful green countryside.
sentences.cn: 从我们的窗口能看见一片美丽的绿色田园风光。

sentences.en: The war has laid waste large regions of the countryside.
sentences.cn: 这场战争摧毁了大片村庄。

sentences.en: There is a fine view of the countryside.
sentences.cn: 这里可以看到乡村的美景。

sentences.en: They will be in raptures over the French countryside.
sentences.cn: 他们会深深爱上法国的乡村。

sentences.en: Two three-lane roads will be carved through countryside.
sentences.cn: 将要修建两条三车道的公路穿过乡间。

trans.tran_en: land that is outside cities and towns
land that is outside cities and towns
